dl.dd: For template-generated content, this specifies the sort key, if you would like the content to be sorted. The key should be the full URI of the RDF resource to sort by, for example 'http://home.netscape.com/NC-rdf#Name'. Place this attribute on the same element as the template.XULAttr("datasources") attribute. Use template.XULAttr("sortResource2") to specify a secondary sort key.
